attributes.action: Create water or splash park in Royston, Herts
attributes.additional_details:
Campaign for a water park/splash park in Royston, Herts.

Responsible department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

We would like to call on the local council to agree to build a way/splash park in Royston, Herts. Similar to those in Letchworth, Stevenage and Baldock - which has a similar demographic.
Royston is the neglected town of North Hertfordshire and we feel the many young people need such a provision.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local council to decide upon.
